p: All eight failures in SHARED‐2 participants represented relapses (i.e., an unquantifiable viral load at the end of treatment followed by a quantifiable viral load at week 24). SHARED‐2 participants with subtype 4r had a lower SVR12 rate compared to those without subtype 4r (50% vs. 91%; P = 0.027). All 8 participants who failed to achieve SVR12 had adherence levels of over 95%, based on pill count.
